WorkItem.Description: Prism does not work for Universal Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows 8.1 Apps, can that please be supported?

Comments.Message:
Hi Mohamed,

Support for Universal or Convergent Apps is in the Prism Roadmap as explained in [this post](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/blaine/archive/2014/04/24/prism-5-0-for-wpf-just-released.aspx) and [this post](http://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/discussions/541667). 

The good news is that the p&p team already published a first drop with the progress being done on that area. You can find the drop under the ["Converged"](https://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest#Converged/) folder in the source code tab of the [Prism for Windows Runtime](https://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/com/) project.

I hope you find this helpful.Thanks,Ez.http://blogs.southworks.net
The first drop is available on [CodePlex](http://prismwindowsruntime.codeplex.com/releases/view/124955).
Any further update on this?  Project templates?
